participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: outgoing and determined, with a passion for sports and helping others.
participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. i am currently in high school. i make straight as in school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: creative and adventurous, always seeking new culinary experiences and enjoying life by the water.
participant_2.background: spiderman is my favorite. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. l also love comic books. if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water.

content.text: hey my name is larry and i am a chef.
